ext_description.message: Show dislikes on Youtube. Return dislikes and ratio bar. Classic ratio bar, controll data sources via options

datasource_id_youtubeMetric.message:
Gets statistic from page meta data. Restore likes\ dislikes based on rating data for video
Currently most accurate method if available

datasource_id_sponsorsBlock.message:
Collects data from user sended actions (from extensions that use same API).
Uses its own data base https://sponsor.ajay.app/database

datasource_id_ryda.message: Uses historical data collected from Youtube API (when it was availabe). Historical data combined with actions that users do via extensions that support this API (cached refreshes for around 2-3 days).

datasource_id_catface.message: Fallback \ backup for sended by extension actions. Can be replacement for SB

datasources_help.message: Extension gets information about dislikes / likes count by making request to data sources by priority. The count may differ based on the source from which the data was obtained in accordance with the order of requests.

datasources_help_1.message: Receive data - extension will try to get statistic from API according to priority. Use as addition data source - count voices from a source in addition to the main data source

datasources_help_2.message: Send actions - extension will send your like \ dislike actions to API

datasources_help_3.message: By default selected most accurate way to get statistic. Depending on what actions YouTube takes, the order and sources may change so that the extension can continue to work.

datasources_help_4.message: To see what data source was used activate option Addition options - Display data source in ratio bar popup

disclaimer.message:
This extension done by myself in spare time.
I try to keep it up-to-date, and collect most relevant data sources, but I can miss something. Feel free to feedback via github or by email in github profile if needed..

datasources_disclaimer.message:
Priority of sources already configured for most accurate results.
Dont change without the need

chik_advice.message: If all works well, don't edit addition options

option_showSource.message: Display data source in ratio bar popup

option_popupAvoidBounds.message: Display popup above the ratio bar (if not fit to view area of screen)
